definition: life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])

sentences.english: A:Therefore,I hope they could help each other and learn from each other.
sentences.chinese: 所以我希望他倆能命相幫助，取長補短。

definition: the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood 木, fire 火, earth 土, metal 金, water 水
